import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)
    features_match = clf_pre.n_features_in_ != ds_X.shape[1]
    return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match

mutants.original_line: return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match
mutants.mutated_line: return predictions_equal or scores_almost_equal or features_match

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)
    features_match = clf_pre.n_features_in_ == ds_X.shape[1]
    return predictions_equal or scores_almost_equal or features_match

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=False)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)
    features_match = clf_pre.n_features_in_ == ds_X.shape[1]
    return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=False)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)
    features_match = clf_pre.n_features_in_ == ds_X.shape[1]
    return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)
    features_match = clf_pre.n_features_in_ == ds_X.shape[2]
    return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)

    return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match

import numpy as np

def validate_classifier_consistency(clf_pre, clf, ds_X, data_pre):
    (y1, score1) = clf_pre.predict(ds_X, return_decision_function=True)
    (y2, score2) = clf.predict(data_pre, return_decision_function=True)
    predictions_equal = np.array_equal(y1, y2)
    scores_almost_equal = np.allclose(score1, score2)
    features_match = clf_pre.n_features_in_ == ds_X.shape[-1]
    return predictions_equal and scores_almost_equal and features_match
